content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed a Python file named "average.py" using the "execute_python_file" command. The file returned the message "The average of the numbers is: 3.0".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "This is a new line of text that I am writing to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: The website I found provides a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.This is an updated log entry.This is a new log entry.\nThis is another productive thing to do: Learn a new language!This is another productive thing to do: Learn a new musical instrument!\n- Research legal resources for upcoming case and prepare outline.", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'featured_article.txt', '<filename>', 'eisenhower_box_notes.txt', 'productive_things_to_do.txt', 'clockify_info.txt', 'clockify_features.txt', 'pumble_features.txt', 'pumble_pricing.txt', 'automate_task.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area_calculation.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/generate_password.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/password_generator.py']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "average.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: The average of the numbers is: 3.0\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt", "text": "- Practice mindfulness and meditation."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
